title: 104_hr2981
content: Entrepreneurial Investment Act of 1996 - Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to prescribe conditions and requirements exempting certain smaller-sized bank holding companies from its proscription against the acquisition of interests in certain nonbanking organizations. Sets forth restrictions upon joint marketing. Requires such bank holding companies to obtain a one-time approval of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System prior to engaging in such investment activities.
